titles.title: A bill to extend benefits under section 8191 of title 5, United States Code, to law enforcement officers and firemen not employed by the United States who are killed or totally disabled in the line of duty.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Criminal Justice.

bill.summary: 7/1/1987--Introduced. Extends Federal benefits (compensation for injuries) to law enforcement officers and firemen not employed by the United States, and not engaged in Federal-related activities, who are killed or totally disabled in the line of duty.
